00050         class TestOfConstrainedAnnotation extends UnitTestCase {
00051                 public function testClassAnnotationThrowsErrorWhenOnMethod() {
00052                         $this->expectError("Annotation 'ClassRestrictedAnnotation' not allowed on BadlyAnnotatedClass::method");
00053                         $reflection = new ReflectionAnnotatedClass('BadlyAnnotatedClass');
00054                         $method = $reflection->getMethod('method');
00055                 }
00056                 
00057                 public function testClassAnnotationThrowsErrorWhenOnProperty() {
00058                         $this->expectError("Annotation 'ClassRestrictedAnnotation' not allowed on BadlyAnnotatedClass::\$property");
00059                         $reflection = new ReflectionAnnotatedClass('BadlyAnnotatedClass');
00060                         $method = $reflection->getProperty('property');
00061                 }
00062                 
00063                 public function testSingleTargetAnnotationThrowsNoErrorWhenOnRightPlace() {
00064                         $reflection = new ReflectionAnnotatedClass('SuccesfullyAnnotatedClass');
00065                         $method = $reflection->getMethod('method');
00066                         $property = $reflection->getProperty('property');
00067                 }
00068                 
00069                 public function testMultiTargetAnnotationThrowsErrorWhenOnWrongPlace() {
00070                         $this->expectError("Annotation 'ClassOrPropertyRestrictedAnnotation' not allowed on BadlyAnnotatedClass::method2");
00071                         $reflection = new ReflectionAnnotatedClass('BadlyAnnotatedClass');
00072                         $method = $reflection->getMethod('method2');
00073                 }
00074                 
00075                 public function testMultiTargetAnnotationThrowsNoErrorWhenOnRightPlace() {
00076                         $reflection = new ReflectionAnnotatedClass('SuccesfullyAnnotatedClass');
00077                         $method = $reflection->getProperty('property2');
00078                 }
00079 
00080                 public function testBadlyNestedAnnotationThrowsError() {
00081                         $this->expectError("Annotation 'MethodRestrictedAnnotation' nesting not allowed");
00082                         $this->expectError("Annotation 'MethodRestrictedAnnotation' nesting not allowed"); // because of parsing
00083                         $reflection = new ReflectionAnnotatedClass('ClassWithBadlyNestedAnnotations');
00084                 }
00085 
00086                 public function testSuccesfullyNestedAnnotationThrowsNoError() {
00087                         $reflection = new ReflectionAnnotatedClass('SuccesfullyAnnotatedClass');
00088                         $reflection->getMethod('method2')->getAnnotation('MethodRestrictedAnnotation');
00089                         
00090                 }
